Articles.Content: Hi. I am new and I was in the middle of building a rocket using 2.5 m body, when suddenly, I was unable to actually edit the rocket. The parts/action groups/crew tabs are greyed out and the only buttons I can click on are the new/load/save/launch/exit buttons. It appears to be some sort of mode. How do I get rid of it? Restarting the game did no good, and neither did exiting and reentering the VAB. Also, how did I get into it in the first place?
Okay... Ummm.... Standard procedure, I suppose. Logs, e.t.c. Try pressing buttons one at a time, maybe f2 since I frankly have no idea.
